wikitext.*:
'''Wolfe Morris''' ([[5 January|January 5]], [[1925]] - [[21 July|July 21]], [[1996]]) was an English actor. His major roles were Padmasambhava in the Dr. Who story arch ''[http://tardis.wikia.com/wiki/The_Abominable_Snowmen The Abominable Snowmen]'' and [[wikipedia:Thomas Cromwell, 1st Earl of Essex|Thomas Cromwell]] in ''[[wikipedia:The Six Wives of Henry VIII (TV series)|The Six Wives of Henry VIII]]''. He also provided the voice of [[Gollum]] in [[BBC|BBC 4]]'s 1968 radio series ''[[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|The Hobbit]]''.
